summary.span: 为 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) XAML 工具提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) XAML tooling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间支持中的类[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基础结构，但不应在代码中直接使用。The classes in this namespace support the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and are not intended to be used directly from your code.
